title: 저작자 표시형 평가 모듈:start
content:
[[module css]]
@import url('https://scpko.wikidot.com/credit:style/code_');
[[/module]]

[[div_ class="creditRate"]]
[[div_ class="rateBox" [[iftags +유산]]style="display:none;"[[/iftags]]]]
[[div_ class="rate-box-with-credit-button"]]
[[module Rate]]
[[div_ class="creditButton"]]
[[a href="#u-credit-view" class="fa fa-info" style="position:relative;"]][[image https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/local--files/nav:side/blank.png title="저작자 표시" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;top:0;left:0;"]][[/a]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="rateBox" [[iftags -유산]]style="display:none;"[[/iftags]]]]
[[div_ class="heritage-rating-module"]]
[[div_ class="heritage-emblem"]]
[[image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:heritage-rating/scp-heritage-v3.png link="[[iftags +유산 +en]]heritage-collection[[/iftags]][[iftags +유산 +jp]]heritage-collection-jp[[/iftags]][[iftags +유산 +fr]]patrimoine-francais-de-la-fondation-scp[[/iftags]]" style="max-width: none;"]]
[[/div]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="creditButton"]]
[[a href="#u-credit-view" class="fa fa-info" style="position:relative;"]][[image https://scp-jp-sandbox2.wikidot.com/local--files/nav:side/blank.png title="저작자 표시" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;top:0;left:0;"]][[/a]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ style="clear:both;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ id="credit-view"]]
[[div_ class="fader"]]
[[iframe https://scpko.wikidot.com/credit:backmodule/code/1 ]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="modalcontainer"]]
[[div_ class="modalbox [[iftags +유산]]heritage[[/iftags]]"]]
[[div_ class="modalbox-title [[iftags +유산]]heritage[[/iftags]]"]]
++* 크레디트
[[/div]]
[[div class="credit"]]
author: Elfen_mathL
